page.title: 14RECREATION
page.content: Leyland has a wide variety of recreational facilities.These include, The{Leisure Centre},Fox Lane Sports Club,Leyland{Sports and Social Club, {Worden Park}and{Health clubs. Families in the area try to take advantage of the nearby facilities, and keen footballers have a choice of teams to play for. Worden Park has much to offer with a children's play park, minature train, trim trail for joggers and craft centre.The Park and its surrounding countryside is ideal for conservationists, atheletes and birdwatchers.Most of the ponds are stocked with fish and they are frequently visited by local coarse fishermen. Fox Lane Sports Club offers many sports.In the evening the club is used for concerts and other social events.
